update tbl_helm_stack_info
release_name = #{releaseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
chart_name = #{chartName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

chart_package_name = #{chartPackageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where stack_id = #{stackId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
